features.weatherDescription: Bona amakuru y'iteganyagihe y'ukuri ku murima wawe.

onboarding.locationDescription: Sangiza aho uri kugira ngo ubone iteganyagihe ry'ukuri n'inama z'ubuhinzi zijyanye n'akarere kawe.
onboarding.locationError: Ntabwo byashobotse kumenya aho uri. Ongera ugerageze.
onboarding.languageSubtitle: Hitamo ururimi ushaka ko umufasha akoresha.

chat.fromVoice: Byavuye mu ijwi â€” bikoreho impinduka niba ngombwa
chat.voiceTranscribed: Ijwi ryahinduwe inyandiko! Bikoreho impinduka niba ngombwa, hanyuma ohereza.

media.photoLibraryPermission: Kugirango uhitemo ifoto, FarmerChat ikeneye kureba amafoto yawe. Uyemerere muri Aho Bihindurirwa.
media.cameraPermission: Kugirango ufate ifoto, FarmerChat ikeneye gukoresha kamera yawe. Uyemerere muri Aho Bihindurirwa.

voice.recordingHint: Kanda 'Emeza' ngo ihindurwe, cyangwa 'Hagarika' ngo uyireke

history.title: Ibiganiro
history.noConversationsHint: Tangira ikiganiro gishya ubone inama z'ubuhinzi.

settings.title: Amasetingi
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Reba serivisi za AI zikora mu gace kawe
settings.locationPermissionDenied: Uburenganzira bwo kumenya aho uri bwanze
settings.locationUpdateFailed: Kuvugurura aho uri byanze. Ongera ugerageze.
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Ibi bizongera bitangire uburyo bwo kuyimenya. Komeza?

mcp.title: Serivisi za AI
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} kuri {total} za serivisi ziboneka aho uherereye

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Kumenya no gusuzuma indwara z'ibihingwa hifashishijwe AI
agrivision.description: Sesengura amashusho y'ibihingwa kugira ngo umenye indwara, udukoko, n'ibura ry'intungamubiri. Ubone inama zo kuvura no kwirinda ako kanya.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Ubutaka
isdaSoil.tagline: Ibiranga ubutaka n'isesengura ry'intungamubiri muri Afurika
isdaSoil.description: Bona amakuru yimbitse ku butaka harimo pH, azote, fosifore, potasiyumu n'izindi ntungamubiri. Ifasha Afurika yose mu bunini bwa metero 30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Ikirere kiriho n'iteganyagihe ku isi yose
accuweather.description: Bona amakuru y'ikirere ako kanya arimo ubushyuhe, ubuhehere, umuvuduko w'umuyaga, n'imvura. Iteganyagihe riboneka kugeza ku minsi 15.

gapWeather.name: Ikirere cya GAP
gapWeather.description: Iteganyagihe ry'ikirere ryihariye ry'ubuhinzi muri Kenya. Harimo ubushyuhe bw'amazi ahumuka, imirasire y'izuba, n'iteganyagihe ry'imvura rihuye n'imyanzuro y'ubuhinzi.

edacap.name: Ikirere cya EDACaP
edacap.description: Iteganyagihe ry'ibihe by'ikirere ririmo ubushyuhe n'iteganyagihe ry'imvura. Rifasha abahinzi gutegura igihe cyo gutera no gusarura.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Amakuru y'ikirere ku hantu hose ku isi
weatherapi.description: Serivisi yuzuye y'amakuru y'ikirere itanga iby'ikirere biriho n'iteganyagihe ku hantu hose ku isi.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Urubuga rw'ubumenyi bw'ikirere rurusha ubundi imbaraga rufite iteganyagihe ryiza cyane n'ubushobozi bwo guteganya ako kanya.

feedFormulation.name: Gutegura ibiryo
feedFormulation.description: Bara imvange y'ibiryo bihendutse cyane ku nka zawe z'amata. Bifata ibihe intego z'umusaruro w'amata, ibiro by'umubiri, n'ibiryo biboneka mu karere.

nextgen.name: Ifumbire ya NextGen
nextgen.tagline: Inama z'ifumbire zihariye ku hantu muri Etiyopiya
nextgen.description: Bona inama z'ifumbire zihariye zishingiye ku hantu hwawe nyirizina. Harimo inama z'ifumbire y'imborera (ifumbire y'imico, vermicompost) n'izitari imborera (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Igiti cy'imyanzuro y'ibihingwa
decisionTree.tagline: Inama z'icyiciro cy'ikura mu bihingwa bya Kenya
decisionTree.description: Bona inama zo gucunga ibihingwa zishingiye ku cyiciro cy'ikura n'ibyumweru biriho by'ikirere. Bigufasha gufata ibyemezo ku gihe ku bijyanye no kurwanya udukoko, kuvomera, no gusarura.

gapAgriculture.name: Ubuhinzi bwa GAP
gapAgriculture.description: Serivisi rusange z'inama z'ubuhinzi zo gucunga ibihingwa n'amatungo.

errors.syncFailed: Ntibyakunze guhuza na seriveri. Ibikoresho bimwe biragabanuka.
errors.uploadFailed: Ntibyakunze kurokora ifoto. Reba interineti wongere.
errors.serverError: Ikibazo kuri seriveri. Ongera ugerageze nyuma.
